definition: Boston ivy or Japanese creeper (Parthenocissus tricuspidata)
to crawl/to climb/to get up or sit up
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Boston ivies crawl along the wall.
View back to the house across a carpet of Parthenocissus quinquefolia in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 視線穿過五葉爬山虎“地毯”看向秋日的住宅。

sentences.english: The slope protection of plant ivy is the breaking and creation in the technique of slope protection for river dyke.
sentences.chinese: 爬山虎植物護坡是江河堤防護坡技術的突破和創新。

sentences.english: I looked carefully and found that there is Parthenocissus "feet" of.
sentences.chinese: 我仔細一看，發現爬山虎是有“腳”的。

sentences.english: The ivy clings to the wall.
I look closely and saw the ivy has the "foot".
sentences.chinese: 我仔細一看，發現爬山虎是有“腳”的。

sentences.english: Students, you have heard of gecko and Parthenocissus game story?
sentences.chinese: 同學們，你們聽說過壁虎和爬山虎比賽的故事嗎？

sentences.english: When you come to my school, you will firstly see a wall covered with green ivy.
sentences.chinese: 走進校園，一牆茂盛的爬山虎撲入眼簾。

definition: variant of 枝椏|枝桠[zhi1 ya1]
